Summary: Sighting of object on Saxonburg Blvd.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was riding my motorcycle to work on the morning of Nov. 7, 2008. It was 8:35am. It was such a clear day the sky was crystal blue. As I passed a farm on Saxonburg Boulevard, I was looking directly into the sky as I was approaching a curve in the road, thinking about how beautiful the sky was and how I would not have too many days like this to ride my motorcycle. I saw a stationary, diamond shaped shiny object up in the sky. I was about to pull over to take a picture but when I came around the curve, I looked up at the sky and the object was gone. I looked in all directions, there was no object to be found anywhere. It made me feel quite small, but I felt like I had witnessed something spectacular. Every day I look up into the sky at that exact spot to see if I can see the object again. Unfortunately, my sighting was only about 7 seconds long, I wish that it had been longer and I had seen the shape move.
